reason: Minor notation issue: the node writes 'f in C^inf(T^3) subset H^1(T^3) subset the Cameron-Martin space, and <f, phi> extends continuously to phi in H^{-1}(T^3) supset D'(T^3)'. The inclusion should be H^{-1}(T^3) SUBSET D'(T^3), i.e., distributions of negative Sobolev regularity are contained in the space of all distributions. The supset symbol is backwards. Additionally, the reference to arXiv:2112.05562 should be verified: this paper concerns the infinite-volume Phi^4_3 measure. For the torus (finite volume), the sub-Gaussian tails follow from the Barashkov-Gubinelli (2020) variational approach (arXiv:1911.10114) combined with Brascamp-Lieb, which should be cited instead or in addition.
